sql: SELECT SUM(Domestic_Tourism_Earnings_Wan_Yuan) FROM tours INNER JOIN cities ON tours.city = cities.name WHERE cities.province IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省') AND year = 2020
SELECT SUM(international_toursim_earnings_Wan_dollar) FROM tours INNER JOIN cities ON tours.city = cities.name WHERE cities.province = '湖北省' AND year = 2020
SELECT SUM(star_hotel_number) FROM tours INNER JOIN cities ON tours.city = cities.name WHERE cities.province = '湖北省' AND year = 2010
SELECT cities.name, COUNT(airports.IATA) AS airport_count FROM cities JOIN airports ON Within(airports.Location, cities.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY cities.name
SELECT cities.name FROM cities LEFT JOIN airports ON Within(airports.Location, cities.Shape) = 1 WHERE airports.IATA IS NULL
SELECT cities.name, COUNT(*) AS FiveA_Spots FROM cities JOIN scenicSpots ON Within(scenicSpots.Location, cities.Shape) = 1 WHERE scenicSpots.level = '5A' GROUP BY cities.name
SELECT provinces.name, Sum(Area(cities.Shape, 1)) as Total_Area FROM provinces INNER JOIN cities ON Contains(provinces.Shape, cities.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY provinces.name

SELECT provinces.name, SUM(Area(cities.Shape, 1)) AS Total_Province_Area FROM provinces JOIN cities ON Contains(provinces.Shape, cities.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY provinces.name ORDER BY Total_Province_Area DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT province FROM cities ORDER BY MbrMinX(Shape) ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT province FROM cities ORDER BY MbrMinY(Shape) ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT cities.name FROM provinces INNER JOIN cities ON Contains(provinces.Shape, cities.Shape) = 1 WHERE provinces.name = '河南省' ORDER BY MbrMaxY(cities.Shape) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(scenicSpots.name) FROM scenicSpots INNER JOIN stations ON Distance(scenicSpots.Location, stations.Location, 1) < 10 * 1000 WHERE stations.name = '六安' AND scenicSpots.level >= '3A'

SELECT scenicSpots.name, Distance(stations.Location, scenicSpots.Location, 1) AS Distance FROM scenicSpots INNER JOIN stations ON Distance(stations.Location, scenicSpots.Location, 1) < 100 * 1000 WHERE stations.name = '岳阳东' AND scenicSpots.level = '5A' ORDER BY Distance

SELECT GDPs.province, COUNT(airports.IATA) AS airport_count FROM GDPs LEFT JOIN cities ON GDPs.province = cities.province LEFT JOIN airports ON Contains(cities.Shape, airports.Location) WHERE GDPs.year_2023 = (SELECT MAX(year_2023) FROM GDPs) GROUP BY GDPs.province
SELECT province FROM GDPs ORDER BY year_2023 DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT city FROM tours WHERE year BETWEEN 2011 AND 2020 ORDER BY international_tourists_number_Wan DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT count(*) FROM airports INNER JOIN cities ON Within(airports.Location, cities.Shape) = 1 WHERE cities.name = '哈尔滨市'
SELECT a.Name FROM airports a INNER JOIN cities b ON Within(a.Location, b.Shape) = 1 WHERE b.name = '北京市'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scenicSpots INNER JOIN cities ON Within(scenicSpots.Location, cities.Shape) = 1 WHERE cities.province = '新疆维吾尔自治区' AND scenicSpots.level >= '3A'
SELECT Area(Shape, 1) as area FROM provinces WHERE name = '西藏自治区'
SELECT SUM(international_toursim_earnings_Wan_dollar) FROM tours INNER JOIN cities ON tours.city = cities.name WHERE cities.province IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省') AND year = 2020
SELECT SUM(Area(provinces.Shape, 1)) FROM provinces WHERE provinces.name IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省')
SELECT name, Area(Shape, 1) as area FROM provinces WHERE name IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省') ORDER BY area DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cities.name) FROM cities INNER JOIN airports ON Distance(cities.Shape, airports.Location, 1) <= 150 * 1000 WHERE airports.Name = '大理'
SELECT scenicSpots.name, Distance(cities.Shape, scenicSpots.Location, 1) AS Distance FROM scenicSpots JOIN cities ON cities.name = '北京市' WHERE scenicSpots.level = '5A' ORDER BY Distance DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT Distance(a.Location, b.Location, 1) AS Distance_in_meters FROM scenicSpots a, scenicSpots b WHERE a.name = '北海公园' AND b.name = '恭王府'

SELECT scenicSpots.name, Distance(scenicSpots.Location, (SELECT Location FROM scenicSpots WHERE name = '八大处公园'), 1) AS Distance FROM scenicSpots WHERE scenicSpots.level = '5A' AND scenicSpots.name != '八大处公园' ORDER BY Distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT cities.name FROM airports JOIN cities ON Contains(cities.Shape, airports.Location) WHERE airports.Name = '阿克苏/温宿'
SELECT cities.name FROM scenicSpots INNER JOIN cities ON Contains(cities.Shape, scenicSpots.Location) WHERE scenicSpots.name = '天台山景区'

SELECT t.city, COUNT(s.name) AS FiveA_Spots FROM tours t LEFT JOIN scenicSpots s ON Contains(cities.Shape, s.Location) AND s.level = '5A' INNER JOIN cities ON cities.name = t.city WHERE t.year = 2020 GROUP BY t.city ORDER BY t.international_tourists_number_Wan DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT cities.province, SUM(tours.Domestic_Tourism_Earnings_Wan_Yuan) AS Domestic_Tourism_Earnings FROM cities JOIN tours ON cities.name = tours.city WHERE cities.province IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省') AND tours.year = 2020 GROUP BY cities.province
SELECT p.name, Area(p.Shape, 1) as area FROM GDPs g JOIN provinces p ON g.province = p.name WHERE g.year_2023 > (SELECT year_2023 FROM GDPs WHERE province = '浙江省')
SELECT city, star_hotel_number FROM tours WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY star_hotel_number DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) AS TotalLength FROM buslines WHERE name = '874路'
SELECT name, SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) AS length FROM buslines GROUP BY name ORDER BY length DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT buslines.name, buslines.start_stop, buslines.end_stop, GLength(buslines.Shape, 1) AS length FROM buslines ORDER BY length DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT Name, SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) AS TotalLength FROM roads GROUP BY Name
SELECT Name, SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) AS TotalLength FROM roads GROUP BY Name ORDER BY TotalLength DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT Sum(Area(Shape, 1)) FROM greenspaces
SELECT NAME, SUM(Area(Shape, 1)) AS Total_Area FROM greenspaces GROUP BY NAME
SELECT NAME, SUM(Area(Shape, 1)) AS TotalArea FROM greenspaces GROUP BY NAME ORDER BY TotalArea DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(Area(Shape, 1)) FROM greenspaces WHERE NAME = '玄武湖公园'

SELECT districts.name, SUM(Area(Intersection(districts.Shape, greenspaces.Shape), 1)) AS GreenArea FROM districts JOIN greenspaces ON Intersects(districts.Shape, greenspaces.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY districts.name

SELECT districts.name, SUM(Area(Intersection(greenspaces.Shape, districts.Shape), 1)) AS total_green_area FROM districts JOIN greenspaces ON Intersects(districts.Shape, greenspaces.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY districts.name ORDER BY total_green_area DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT subways.Line, COUNT(*) as StationCount FROM subways INNER JOIN subwaystations ON subways.Line = subwaystations.Line GROUP BY subways.Line
SELECT subways.Line, COUNT(subwaystations.station) AS StationCount FROM subways JOIN subwaystations ON subways.Line = subwaystations.Line GROUP BY subways.Line
SELECT buslines.name FROM buslines INNER JOIN busstops ON buslines.start_stop = busstops.name WHERE buslines.start_time = '0500'
SELECT hotels.NAME, Distance(busstops.Location, hotels.Location, 1) AS Distance FROM hotels INNER JOIN busstops ON busstops.name = '三元巷' ORDER BY Distance ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT subways.Line, COUNT(*) AS StationCount FROM subways JOIN subwaystations ON subways.Line = subwaystations.Line GROUP BY subways.Line ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT subways.Line, COUNT(DISTINCT districts.name) FROM subways JOIN districts ON Intersects(subways.Shape, districts.Shape) GROUP BY subways.Line
SELECT Sum(GLength(Shape, 1)) AS Length FROM subways WHERE Line = 'line4'

SELECT distinct other_subways.Line FROM subways AS line10_2 JOIN subways AS other_subways ON Intersects(line10_2.Shape, other_subways.Shape) = 1 WHERE line10_2.Line = 'line10二期' AND other_subways.Line != 'line10二期'
SELECT SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) FROM subways
SELECT subwaystations.station, Distance(agencies.Location, subwaystations.Location, 1) AS distance FROM agencies JOIN subwaystations WHERE agencies.NAME = '南京市文物局' ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT hotels.NAME, Distance(subwaystations.Location, hotels.Location, 1) AS Distance FROM hotels INNER JOIN subwaystations ON Distance(subwaystations.Location, hotels.Location, 1) < 1000 WHERE subwaystations.station = '鼓楼' AND subwaystations.Line = 'line4' ORDER BY Distance

SELECT subwaystations.station FROM subwaystations JOIN ( SELECT Intersection(buslines1.Shape, buslines2.Shape) AS IntersectionPoint FROM buslines AS buslines1 JOIN buslines AS buslines2 ON buslines1.lineID != buslines2.lineID WHERE buslines1.name = '874路' AND buslines2.name = '711路' ) AS IntersectionPoints ON Distance(IntersectionPoints.IntersectionPoint, subwaystations.Location, 1) IS NOT NULL ORDER BY Distance(IntersectionPoints.IntersectionPoint, subwaystations.Location, 1) ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(Intersection(a.Shape, b.Shape), subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM roads a, roads b, subwaystations WHERE a.Name = '秦淮路' AND b.Name = '将军大道' AND Intersects(a.Shape, b.Shape) = 1 ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT Name, SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) AS TotalLength FROM rails GROUP BY Name
SELECT Name, SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) AS TotalLength FROM rails GROUP BY Name ORDER BY TotalLength DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) FROM rails
SELECT districts.name, COUNT(*) AS num_agencies FROM agencies INNER JOIN districts ON Within(agencies.Location, districts.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY districts.name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT districts.name FROM districts INNER JOIN subwaystations ON Within(subwaystations.Location, districts.Shape) = 1 WHERE subwaystations.station = '大行宫'
SELECT districts.name FROM agencies INNER JOIN districts ON Contains(districts.Shape, agencies.Location) WHERE agencies.NAME = '江苏省海事局'
SELECT name, Area(Shape, 1) as area FROM districts ORDER BY area DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT name, Area(Shape, 1) as area FROM districts
SELECT districts.name, COUNT(DISTINCT subways.Line) AS subway_lines_count FROM districts JOIN subways ON Intersects(districts.Shape, subways.Shape) GROUP BY districts.name
SELECT hotels.name FROM hotels INNER JOIN roads ON Distance(hotels.Location, roads.Shape, 1) < 1000 WHERE roads.Name = '广州路'

SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(agencies.Location, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM agencies JOIN subwaystations WHERE agencies.NAME = '南京市房产局' GROUP BY subwaystations.station ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.Line) FROM districts d JOIN subways s ON Intersects(d.Shape, s.Shape) WHERE d.name = '玄武区'

SELECT buslines.name FROM buslines JOIN busstops ON buslines.start_stop = busstops.name OR buslines.end_stop = busstops.name JOIN districts ON Contains(districts.Shape, busstops.Location) WHERE districts.name = '六合区' AND buslines.start_time <= '0500'
SELECT districts.name, buslines.name FROM districts INNER JOIN buslines ON Intersects(districts.Shape, buslines.Shape) = 1 WHERE buslines.start_time < '0500'

SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(buslines.Shape, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM subwaystations JOIN subways ON subwaystations.Line = subways.Line JOIN buslines ON buslines.name = '709路' GROUP BY subwaystations.station ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT h.NAME, Distance(h.Location, a.Location, 1) AS Distance FROM hotels h, agencies a WHERE a.NAME = '南京市文物局' AND Distance(h.Location, a.Location, 1) < 500 ORDER BY Distance ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT buslines.name FROM buslines JOIN roads ON Intersects(buslines.Shape, roads.Shape) = 1 WHERE roads.Name = '建康路'
SELECT districts.name, COUNT(*) AS num_agencies FROM agencies INNER JOIN districts ON Within(agencies.Location, districts.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY districts.name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT hotels.NAME, MIN(Distance(hotels.Location, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM hotels INNER JOIN subwaystations ON subwaystations.station = '南京南站' INNER JOIN districts ON Within(hotels.Location, districts.Shape) = 1 AND districts.name = '江宁区' GROUP BY hotels.NAME ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT districts.name, SUM(GLength(Intersection(districts.Shape, subways.Shape), 1)) AS SubwayLength FROM districts INNER JOIN subways ON Intersects(districts.Shape, subways.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY districts.name

SELECT districts.name, SUM(GLength(Intersection(subways.Shape, districts.Shape), 1)) AS TotalSubwayLength FROM districts INNER JOIN subways ON Intersects(subways.Shape, districts.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY districts.name ORDER BY TotalSubwayLength DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT DISTINCT subways.Line FROM subways JOIN districts ON Intersects(subways.Shape, districts.Shape) = 1 WHERE districts.name = '玄武区'
SELECT DISTINCT districts.name FROM districts INNER JOIN rails ON Intersects(districts.Shape, rails.Shape) = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hotels INNER JOIN districts ON Contains(districts.Shape, hotels.Location) WHERE districts.name = '玄武区'
SELECT COUNT(hotels.NAME) FROM hotels JOIN subways ON Distance(subways.Shape, hotels.Location, 1) < 500 WHERE subways.Line = 'S7'
SELECT DISTINCT districts.name FROM greenspaces INNER JOIN districts ON Intersects(districts.Shape, greenspaces.Shape) = 1 WHERE greenspaces.NAME = '钟山风景区'

SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(greenspaces.Shape, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM greenspaces JOIN subwaystations WHERE greenspaces.NAME = '郑和公园' GROUP BY subwaystations.station ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT greenspaces.NAME FROM greenspaces INNER JOIN subwaystations ON subwaystations.station = '上海路' WHERE greenspaces.NAME LIKE '%公园%' ORDER BY Distance(subwaystations.Location, greenspaces.Shape, 1) ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(Area(Intersection(districts.Shape, rivers.Shape), 1)) AS YangtzeRiverArea FROM districts JOIN rivers ON Intersects(districts.Shape, rivers.Shape) = 1 WHERE rivers.Name = '长江' AND districts.name = '南京市'
SELECT DISTINCT subways.Line FROM subways INNER JOIN rivers ON Intersects(subways.Shape, rivers.Shape) = 1 WHERE rivers.Name = '长江'
SELECT DISTINCT districts.name FROM rivers INNER JOIN districts ON Intersects(districts.Shape, rivers.Shape) = 1 WHERE rivers.Name = '长江' AND districts.name LIKE '%南京%'

SELECT districts.name, SUM(Area(Intersection(districts.Shape, rivers.Shape), 1)) AS YangtzeRiverArea FROM districts INNER JOIN rivers ON Intersects(districts.Shape, rivers.Shape) = 1 WHERE rivers.Name = '长江' GROUP BY districts.name
SELECT distinct subwaystations.station FROM subwaystations JOIN rivers ON rivers.Name = '长江' WHERE Distance(rivers.Shape, subwaystations.Location, 1) <= 1000
SELECT DISTINCT buslines.name FROM buslines JOIN rivers ON Intersects(buslines.Shape, rivers.Shape) = 1 WHERE rivers.name = '长江'
SELECT hotels.NAME FROM hotels JOIN rivers ON rivers.Name = '长江' ORDER BY Distance(hotels.Location, rivers.Shape, 1) ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT hotels.NAME, MIN(Distance(agencies.Location, hotels.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM agencies INNER JOIN hotels WHERE agencies.NAME = '高淳县教育局委员会' ORDER BY distance LIMIT 1

SELECT greenspaces.NAME, MIN(Distance(subways.Shape, greenspaces.Shape, 1)) AS Distance FROM greenspaces INNER JOIN subways ON subways.Line = 'line1' WHERE greenspaces.NAME LIKE '%公园%' GROUP BY greenspaces.NAME ORDER BY Distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT districts.name, COUNT(*) AS station_count FROM districts INNER JOIN subwaystations ON Within(subwaystations.Location, districts.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY districts.name
SELECT districts.name, COUNT(*) AS station_count FROM districts JOIN subwaystations ON Contains(districts.Shape, subwaystations.Location) GROUP BY districts.name ORDER BY station_count DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT Line, MAX(GLength(Shape, 1)) as MaxLength FROM subways GROUP BY Line ORDER BY MaxLength DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT distinct roads.Name FROM roads AS r1 JOIN roads AS r2 ON Intersects(r1.Shape, r2.Shape) = 1 WHERE r1.Name = '东风路' AND r2.Name != '东风路'

SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(hotels.Location, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM hotels INNER JOIN subwaystations WHERE hotels.NAME = '金龙大酒店' GROUP BY hotels.NAME ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT name, Area(Shape, 1) AS Area FROM districts WHERE name IN ('玄武区', '秦淮区')
